name: blue-carbon-registry-mvp
description: Blockchain-Based Blue Carbon Registry and MRV System for SIH 2024

scripts.install-all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../blockchain && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run blockchain"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../blockchain && npx hardhat test
scripts.deploy: cd blockchain && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js

author: SIH Team
